GitHub

Personal Site - The repository holding the code for this site built using GitHub’s Jekyll static site generator.

Complete Me - A project to emulate autocomplete functionality in Ruby using a trie. To some degree, the Complete Me project was an extension of our Binary Search Tree project.

Sorting Suite - A basic suite of sorting algorithms built in Ruby.

Mastermind - A REPL for the ‘70’s board game Mastermind built in my first week at Turing.
